channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jacksonville Jaguars Sign Left Tackle Cole Van Lanen to $51 Million Extension
item.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars have reportedly signed left tackle Cole Van Lanen to a three-year, $51 million extension.

item.title: SMU Upsets No. 21 Arizona in Holiday Bowl, Snaps 5-Game Postseason Losing Streak

item.title: No. 17 Arizona Wildcats vs. SMU Mustangs Highlights | FOX College Football
item.description: Check out the best moments between the Arizona Wildcats and SMU Mustangs in the Holiday Bowl.

item.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: Red Sox Make 'Aggressive Offer' to Alex Bregman
item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: No. 13 Nebraska Survives Against No. 9 Michigan State to Stay Undefeated
item.description: Thanks to a tie-breaking Rienk Mast three-pointer, the Cornhuskers edged the Spartans to extend the longest active winning streak in the nation.
